targets.rawSql:
IF '${ShowEstimatedUsage}' = "Yes" THEN
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  IFNULL(SUM(WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400) / day(max(UpdateTime)) * day(date(last_day(max(UpdateTime)))), 0) AS "Estimated Total Usage"
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  MONTH(Date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())
  and YEAR(Date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
  and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup);
END IF;

IF '${LineSeries}' = "Both" OR '${LineSeries}' = "Just Capacity" THEN
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Capacity)
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Capacity"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
FROM Capacity
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Project in ($Project)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1);
END IF;

IF '${LineSeries}' = "Both" OR '${LineSeries}' = "Just Allocation" THEN
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Allocation)
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Allocation"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
FROM Allocations
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Activity in ($VO)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1);
END IF;

SELECT
  Date as "time",
  VO,
  SUM((WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) as ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Average Core Usage by Activity and Month

ORDER BY Date
